messages.subject: RE: [nihontostudy] Book index wanted
messages.msgSnippet: Hello Rich, Isn t it in the back of the book?  There is an English index in the back of both my Koto and Shinto books.  Maybe there were several editions? Jim
messages.messageBody:
Hello Rich,

Isn't it in the back of the book? There is an English index in the back of
both my Koto and Shinto books. Maybe there were several editions?

Jim

-----Original Message-----
From: alchemyst [mailto:alchemyst@...]
Sent: Saturday, June 12, 2004 6:14 PM
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [nihontostudy] Book index wanted

I am trying to find an English index to the Nihonto Zuikan (two books
...Shinto and Koto). Author was Kataoka Kinsaku. If you have one for
sale or know where I can find one,
I'd appreciate dropping me a line.

Thanks
Rich S
alchemyst@...
